abstract: College students from across the Northeast U.S. and Canada descended on NYU for hackNY's Fall Hackathon. The New York Times APIs were one of 14 official event APIs, all of which came from a New York City startup or, in the Times's case, institution. In order to win the best hacks competition, a developer team had to use at least one of the event APIs.

headline.main: Students hack The New York Times at hackNY Fall Hackathon
